description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Inventory_Par_CountObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Inventory_Par_CountObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Inventory_Par_CountObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Inventory Par Count .

validation.validation: There is an active par count for this par location. Please select the existing par count for editing on the previous page.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

description: Business Process Parameters provide the ability to auto-submit to the business process.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: Reference to an existing Inventory Par Location Line in the Workday system. This is used to create a new Inventory Par Count Line from Inventory Par Location Line and must be provided when creating a new Par Count.

validation.validation: When creating a new Par Count you must provide the Par Location Line.
The referenced Par Location Line [line] does not belong to the Par Location.

Inventory_Par_Count_LineObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Inventory_Par_Count_LineObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Inventory_Par_Count_LineObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: Reference to an existing Inventory Par Count Line. This is used to update the  Line with Count/Order Quantity on an existing Open Inventory Par Count and must be provided when updating an existing Par Count.

validation.validation: When updating a Par Count you must provide the Par Count Line.
The referenced Par Count Line [line] does not belong to the Par Count.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: The line number of the Inventory Par Count Line.

validation.validation: A Bin [bin] was provided but it does not match the Bin on the Par Location/Count Line. The Bin is optional but if provided, must match the line's Bin.

validation.validation: A Unit of Measure was provided but it does not match the UOM on the Par Location/Count Line. The UOM is optional but if provided, must match the line's UOM.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: Count Quantity for Inventory Par Count Line, Should be entered only if Par Count Option is set to Count Quantity.

validation.validation: Enter Count Quantity or select Zero On Hand option for the Required Items
The Par Count option is Request Order Quantity but the Count Quantity has a value.  The Count Quantity must be zero.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: Request Quantity for Inventory Par Count Line, Should be entered only if Par Count Option is set to Request Quantity

validation.validation: The Par Count option is Count Quantity but the Request Quantity has a value. The Request Quantity must be zero.

Inventory_Par_Count_Line_Data.description: Set Zero On Hand option to indicate Count Quantiy is zero when Par Count Option is set to Count Quantity

validation.validation: Cannot enter count quantity when zero on hand is true.
